org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel

Class ViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.Component
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.BaseViewModel
        • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.ViewModel

  • public class ViewModel
extends BaseViewModel
    View model used for creating and binding views.

    • Method Detail

      • convertView

        public android.view.View convertView(android.view.View viewToConvert)
        Attempt to unbind a pre-existing view from its view model and bind it to this view model.
        Parameters:
        viewToConvert - The view to convert.
        Returns:
        Null if viewToConvert is null. Null if viewToConvert corresponds to a different view model class. The bound view otherwise.

      • createView

        public android.view.View createView()
        Create a view corresponding to this view model. Created with a null parent. The View Model is stored as a tag on the root View using ObjectTagger. This makes sure that the View Model is kept alive as long as the View is alive.
        Returns:
        The created view.

      • createView

        public android.view.View createView(android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Create a view corresponding to this view model. The View Model is stored as a tag on the root View using ObjectTagger. This makes sure that the View Model is kept alive as long as the View is alive.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent to attach the created view to.
        Returns:
        The created view.

      • bindProperty

        protected final Binding bindProperty(java.lang.String property,
                   int viewId,
                   java.lang.String viewProperty,
                   ValueConverter valueConverter,
                   BindMode bindMode)
        Bind a property of this view model to a property of a view in its layout.
        Specified by:
        bindProperty in class BaseViewModel
        Parameters:
        property - The property of the view model
        viewId - The id of the target view.
        viewProperty - The property of the target view.
        valueConverter - The value converter to use for conversion.
        bindMode - The bind mode to use.
        Returns:
        The created binding.

      • bindAction

        protected Binding bindAction(int viewId,
                 java.lang.Class<? extends EventArg> eventType,
                 java.lang.String action)
        Binds an event of this view model to an action of a view in its layout.
        Specified by:
        bindAction in class BaseViewModel
        Parameters:
        viewId - The id of the target view.
        eventType - The event arg class to bind.
        action - The action of the target view.
        Returns:
        The created binding.
